I was skeptical of the game at first because what i saw was just hide and seek and 0 fighting. But then I went ahead and gave it a try and fell in love with the terrifying feel and competitive concept of the game. I have close to 0 complaints besides I wish it had an optional in game chat or com system to help non grouped players coordinate 

- Triggaheartz, Musical Artist
Very fun. I would rate it a 7/10 from the scariness

Very Fun! Don't be a sore loser, the killer is suppose to kill, don't get upset if you die very quickly into the match, you'll be in better ones. The survivor is suppose to survive, don't get mad if you can't catch them all, you play more and more to get better. Learn how to have fun while playing this!

This is a very fun multiplayer hide-and-seek game! I enjoy the mystery of not knowing what killer you will face (at first) and not knowing what perks they are running. In return, the killer does not know the survivors perks or play style, making for a different adventure each time; no two games are the same! Would highly recommend. 5 Stars.

한국 유저들은 "절대" 살인마를 플레이하지 않길 추천한다. 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 절대 하지마
게임 자체는 재밌게 나와있으나 유저들때문에 비추를 한다. 매 판 만나는 티배깅. 플래시 딸깍거리면서 따라다니는 어그로때문에 살인마는 절대 멘탈이 버틸 수가 없다. 일섭에서 vpn으로까지 하고싶지는 않아서 겜 그냥 접으려고 한다. 생존자 중 이 글을 보며 그것도 게임의 일부라고 생각하거나 못하는 살인마의 뺴액거림이라고 생각할 수도 있겠으나 뉴비 살인마 다 떨어져나가면 누가 손해일까? 고작 연두색 녹색 살인마 상대로 올 생존해놓고 채팅창에서 못한다며 채팅까지 치는 애들 보고있으면 정말 맥이 빠진다. 
결론 다시 말하겠다. 살인마가 하고 싶어서 이 게임을 사려고 한다면 당장 그 손을 멈춰라. 진심이다.

It's late at night, you're a kid hanging out with your friends at a sleepover.  Tensions are high since you just watched an R-Rated Horror Slasher Film and someone suggested hide and seek in the dark.  This isn't your house and you've only been there a time or two with your friend Ryan.  

You find the perfect hiding spot and all is well until you hear you friends being found one-by-one.  You hear the seeker getting closer and closer to you spot until they eventually move on.  You sigh with relief when suddenly you're grabbed by the seeker who knew this closet had two entrances

"Ahhhhhhhhgh!", you shriek as your heart is beating out of your chest and all of your friends are laughing never hearing such a sound come from their friend.  Your mind is relieved it is all just a game.

That is the best way I can describe this game.  It's like hide and seek with friends, only one of them is a chainsaw wielding mad man who won't stop camping the exit and keeps his mic muted to add to the creep factor.  

I highly recommend this game to fans of old slasher/horror films and those who like to game with all of their friends online.

ちょっとバグが酷過ぎますね。
最近(2020/09/06)、頻繁にスタックするようになりました。
ゲームになりません。

最悪自分が動けないだけなら良いのですが、問題なのは「この状態ではキラーが殺してくれないと、時間切れでもマッチが終了しない」事なんですよね。
まさかエンティティにすら見捨てられるとは思いませんでした。

Great concept and some great characters, but ultimately a flawed system. New players are punished brutality with not only a lack of mechanism knowledge, but no perk bonuses that skilled players have. The community is extremely brutal and rude, often abusing new players with mocking gameplay and disrespectful messages in chat after game. 

For the gameplay itself, when everyone is playing up to the theme, the game can be thrilling and enjoyable. But more-often-than-not, players are doing ridiculous, (but well within the meta) tactics like looping, body-blocking, and more that make the killer seem dramatically less imposing. The entire "horror" aspect drains away, simply leaving a weak 1st/3rd person QTE based game with high levels of gore.

Try it if you're curious about the dynamics, but the gameplay and monetization methods, while not the worst, are very addicting. Buyer beware, as you'll likely be tempted to spend a lot more on extra characters and outifts.
Slow bloodpoints fast matches and empty wallet... GG
